game.name: Tiny Alien
game.description:
The galaxy is going to be finished with the theft of countless beautiful and powerful gems. Experts say that it will soon be dominated by the evil empire. Luckily, you have reached there to mark the victory over the evil empire and help the galaxy get their all sacred gems back. So, what are you waiting for? Join Tiny Alien game and get yourself ready to travel through the space that is full of obstacles and explore new places. Use your skill to jump through various challenging levels and avoid the traps. 

Remember the merciless soldiers are everywhere in the evil empire where you have entered right away. Fight hard with them to take all the precious gems back in this one of the adventure games for boys. High-tech gadgets, laser cannons, mean aliens and more to explore. Jump across various dangers to complete each level in this free online platform game. You are not alone in this journey since your companion laser will stay with you all the time to defeat your enemies. Get ready to walk through the rays by moving over the obstacles. 

Keep your eyes on the dangerous like deadly gaps and other threats such as gun turrets. You will get the coins for killing each enemy on your way. So, try to kill as many as you can to get the highest score. Use those coins to purchase shields or enhance the laser beam. You can also change the appearance of your alien with the help of coins. Different upgrades and unlocks, challenging gameplay and colorful 2D graphics will be enough to have fun in this arcade adventure.
